Class AtomTorsion

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractTorsion
      • AtomTorsion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Immutable, java.io.Serializable

    public class AtomTorsion
extends AbstractTorsion
    Represents a torsion composed of concrete atoms.

    Torsion is: atom1-atom2-atom3-atom4

    Torsion angle calculated between atoms 2 and 3.

    If moved, the convention is to hold atom1 fixed and allow atom4 to move.

    This class contains a pre-computed list of the atoms to be rotated and the rotation axis.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
